name: skillsmatchergame
description: A Game to match desired skills with a candidate

scripts.build: mkdir -p build && cp {style.css,index.html,Main.js} build && cp -a assets build && concat-cli -f src/OutOfBoundsColider.js src/ImgSprite.js src/StaticModel.js src/BackgroundItemFactory.js src/colider.js src/HitBox.js src/AutomatedDropModel.js src/SkillFactory.js src/SkillSprite.js src/Boundry.js src/KeyboardInputSource.js src/PlayerFactory.js src/CharacterSprite.js src/KeyboardListenerModel.js src/Character.js src/Game.js -o build/script.js && karma start

author: Sam Fare
